API reference¶

Data Module¶

osnap.data.read_ltdb(sample, fullcount) Read data from Brown’s Longitudinal Tract Database (LTDB) and store it for later use.
osnap.data.read_ncdb(filepath) Read data from Geolytics’s Neighborhood Change Database (NCDB) and store it for later use.
osnap.data.Dataset(source[, statefips, …]) Container for storing neighborhood data for a study region

Analytics Module¶

Clustering Methods¶

osnap.analytics.cluster(dataset[, …]) Create a geodemographic typology by running a cluster analysis on the metro area’s neighborhood attributes
osnap.analytics.cluster_spatial(dataset[, …]) Create a spatial geodemographic typology by running a cluster analysis on the metro area’s neighborhood attributes and including a contiguity constraint.

Dynamics Methods¶

osnap.analytics.Sequence(y[, subs_mat, …]) Pairwise sequence analysis.
osnap.analytics.Transition(dataset, w_type) (Spatial) Markov approaches to transitional dynamics of neighborhood types.
